channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1688; 11:00PM; 2214 S Glyndon Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LDmTWN; Venice; KNOCKDOWN: 40 firefighters extinguished the fire in 48 minutes. The home appears to be vacant and sustained significant damage with the attic fully involved in fire. One male firefighter sustained a non-life threatening injury and was unable to descend the ladder from the roof. A litter basket operation was conducted to bring him down and he was transported to the hospital. No further details.; FS 63; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 BC9 CM40 CM42 E205 E263 E295 E62 E63 E67 EM11 RA58 RA63 T5 T63 T95; CH9; 16; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1688; 10:48PM; 2214 S Glyndon Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LDmTWN; Venice; Firefighters have knocked down the bulk of the fire and are working to address the remaining hot spots. One male firefighter sustained a non-life threatening injury while working on the roof and is not able to climb down the ladder. Therefore a litter basket operation is being established to safely bring him down for transport to the hospital.; FS 63; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 BC9 E205 E263 E62 E63 E67 RA63 T5 T63; CH9; 16; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1688; 10:12PM; 2214 S Glyndon Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LDmTWN; Venice; Two story, single family dwelling with a fully involved attack fire. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. There is at least one structure expose on the East side of the building.; FS 63; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E263 E62 E63 RA63 T63; CH9; 16; Margaret Stewart

Traffic - FATALITY; INC#1563; 08:51PM; Nb 5 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3B2OTOO; Griffith Park; Two car collision with one male patient, approximately 40yrs old, sadly determined dead on scene. CHP Log# 2800. No further details available. ; FS 56; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; E250 E56 RA56 T50; CH4; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1278; 06:15PM; 643 S San Pedro St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nAf4Js; Downtown; KNOCKDOWN: This incident is at the Greater Alarm status and the first arriving 40+ firefighters extinguished the fire in 30 minutes. The fire extended into and was contained to one side of the commercial building. A thorough search of the structure located no occupants. One firefighter sustained a non-life threatening injury and was being transported to the hospital for further care. PIO Captain Cody Weireter is enroute for media availability with estimated arrival time of 6:25PM. ; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E17 E202 E203 E210 E211 E4 E89 E9 EM1 HR3 RA209 RA803 RA9 SQ21 T10 T11 T2 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 14 16; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1278; 05:45PM; 643 S San Pedro St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nAf4Js; Downtown; Exterior fire extending into a two story, commercial building. Three additional task forces requested. Firefighter are in the offensive mode.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E17 E202 E203 E210 E211 E4 E89 E9 EM1 HR3 RA209 RA803 RA9 SQ21 T10 T11 T2 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 14 16; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue - Hoist Op; INC#0736; 12:20PM; 16899 Calle Bellevista; MAP: https://bit.ly/42xTNPI; Pacific Palisades; LAFD Air Ops located a 78yo male hiker in serious medical distress (no traumatic injuries). They lowered two aeromedics to assess him and are preparing for a hoist operation followed by transport to the hospital. The 9-1-1 call was received at 11:38AM No further details.; FS 23; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; AO1 AO2 BC9 BP23 E23 E269 E293 H3 H7 HA3 HA7 RA23 RH114 T69 T93; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1660; 10:15PM; 1274 W Court St; MAP: https://bit.ly/44MppmD; Echo Park; KNOCKDOWN: The first 26 firefighters initiated a transitional attack (coordinated application of water from the exterior of the structure that provides a 'break of the fire triangle' by cooling the environment prior to transitioning to an offensive attack) and once they knocked back the fire at the front of the structure they made entry for an offensive attack. It is a small structure (not currently occupied) and no other buildings were damaged. The additionally requested fire companies were canceled enroute. The knockdown was achieved in 15 minutes. A thorough search of the home found no one inside the building. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details. ; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E11 E20 E211 E220 E235 RA11 RA3 T11 T20 T35; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1660; 10:00PM; 1274 W Court St; MAP: https://bit.ly/44MppmD; Echo Park; One story, single family dwelling with heavy fire showing. Two additional task forces requested. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 E11 E20 E220 RA3 T20; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1375; 06:23PM; 9507 S Western Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/417MtZT; #GramercyPark; The first 32 LAFD firefighters, with assistance from LA Co FD on scene, extinguished the flames in one bungalow in 14 minutes, protecting the remainder of the nearby bungalows in the row. No one trapped. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E264 E295 E57 E64 E66 RA257 RA57 RA857 T64 T95; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange
